title: An Ivory Comb With an Ancient Message: Get Rid of Beard Lice.
description: Archaeologists in Israel unearthed a tiny ivory comb inscribed with the oldest known sentence written in an alphabet that evolved into one we use today.
dc:creator: Oliver Whang
media:description: A 3,700-year-old ivory comb found in southern Israel bears an inscription that reads, “May this tusk root out the lice of the hair and the beard.”
